attributes.action: OUTLAW THE REMOVAL OF LIVE CRAB CLAWS BY FISHERMEN
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
"The Marine Conservation Society (MCS) claimed crabs were being found alive on the reefs around the St Kilda World Heritage site with both claws removed". (BBC)

Crabs are having their claws removed for sale in fishmongers or restaurants before they are thrown back into the sea alive.

Although crabs are able to regenerate claws this practice is very likely to cause them to starve to death or die from shock before, especially in large crabs. 

This is an unsustainable and cruel practice, which needs to be stopped.
